definition: currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Zara's now much in demand but why?
sentences.chinese: 薩拉現在成爲當紅炸子雞爲什麼呢？

sentences.english: She rose to stardom with the song "Homecoming" in 1984.
sentences.chinese: 1984年，她以“似水流年”迅速成爲當紅明星。

sentences.english: Now financial seismology is where it's all at.
sentences.chinese: 如今，金融地震學正當紅。

sentences.english: One of Israel's leading pop singers is called Ninet.
sentences.chinese: 而以色列當紅流行歌手之一就叫Ninet。

sentences.english: Presumably that's all on top of the addiction, loneliness, depression and syphilis.
sentences.chinese: 估計最當紅的就是網路引發成癮，孤獨，抑鬱和梅毒。

sentences.english: When red fruits WenXue also said in, special approval.
sentences.chinese: 當紅果說溫雪也在時，特殊贊同去了。

sentences.english: No one modern artist could keep loving fans warm-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一個當紅藝人可以保持這種愛粉絲的熱情。

sentences.english: The photo on patients with a popular Hollywood movie star and embracing smile.
sentences.chinese: 照片上這位患者與一名好萊塢當紅影星相擁而笑。

sentences.english: A popular singer of the day told me a story during my interview with her.
sentences.chinese: 這是我在採訪一個當紅歌星時她給我講的故事。

sentences.english: Birgit was a popular actress with half a decade of filmmaking behind her.
sentences.chinese: 比吉特曾是一位當紅女演員，有着五年的從影經歷。

sentences.english: This is part of the Illuminati's longstanding plan to recruit popular performers.
sentences.chinese: 這是光明會吸納當紅藝人的計劃的一小部分。

definition: to be popular/to be in luck/to have good luck/to develop smoothly
to be a big hit/to be hugely popular
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
lit. burn your hand, feel the heat (idiom)/fig. arrogance of the powerful/a mighty figure no-one dares approach/hot (exciting or in favor)
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
Chow Yun-Fat (1955-), Hong Kong TV and film star
